body.para: Then click on 'Revert widget templates to default' link at the bottom of the Template code box.

★Vin - Official Blog*Star 2007-2009★ http://betabloggerfordummies.blogspot.com http://seoblogadsense.blogspot.com http://widgetry.blogspot.com http://tipsforbloggers.blogspot.com http://twitter.com/Vin07

quote.quotepara: I don't believe I was very clear in my previous question, so I'll try again~
It seems my "Configure Blog Posts" edit feature is *stuck*. At least part of it is. I am not able to add on the "Reactions" feature, nor move my current items around.
The "Configure Blog Posts" window that pops up has my desired changes saved correctly - yet those changes are not reflected on my actual blog.
So while I believe I am clicking all the right buttons and such, it does not seem to be working. Any ideas on why this is? And how do I go about fixing this problem??
